title: Ukraine scandal: Digging up dirt, burying a presidency
text:
What's next in the Ukraine-impeachment scandal? A few cartoonists take a look.

Can one conversation take down a presidency?

If Democrats have their way, yes it can.

More than a few cartoonists have analyzed that ill-fated exchange between President Donald Trump and Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky. Take a look at the gallery above to check out their views. What was Trump thinking when he asked Zelensky to investigate political rival and former Vice President Joe Biden and Biden's son? And what will happen to Democratic attempts at impeachment?

What about presidential lawyer Rudy Giuliani and Justice Department head William Barr? Both were mentioned during the phone call in which Zelensky was not pressured but then again pressured to dig up dirt. How do they fit into all of this?

Looks like the dirt Trump tried to collect, may end up being the very thing that buries him.

Take a look at cartoonists views on Ukraine in the gallery above. Then, vote for your favorite cartoonist in the poll below!
